title:
On the two-dimensional harmonic oscillator with an electric field
  confined to a circular box
authors:
Francisco M. Fern\'andez, Javier Garcia, Norberto Aquino and Antonio
  Flores-Riveros
abstract:
We revisit the quantum-mechanical two-dimensional harmonic oscillator with an
electric field confined to a circular box of impenetrable walls. In order to
obtain the energy spectrum we resort to the Rayleigh-Ritz method with
polynomial and Gaussian basis sets. We compare present results with those
derived recently by other authors. We discuss the limits of large and small box
radius and also do some calculations with perturbation theory.
